content.raw:
There are some clang warnings about deprecated functionality used in qttreepropertybrowser.cpp (`QStyleOptionViewItemV3` and `QStyleOptionViewItemV2`)

* http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_homebrew/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/868/warnings8Result/package.631921960/
* http://doc.qt.io/qt-5/qstyleoptionviewitem-obsolete.html

I'm not sure when those were deprecated or what the recommended interface is
